_meanings:
To rain upon,
pour, sprinkle, water, bedew, cover
with (a shower of any thing), pour
or shower down upon;  
{#prasnavenABivarzaMtI (BuvaM)#} <ls>R. 1. 84</ls>; <ls n="R.">10. 48</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 58</ls>,
<ls n="R. 15.">99</ls>; <ls>Ki. 2. 31</ls>; {#bARErmAmaBivarzati#}  
<ls>V. 4.</ls>

To sprinkle or cover
with, shower upon,
